subject: Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: Colts Coach Jim Caldwell may have frustrated Peyton Manning by benching him in a loss to the Jets, but he showed he learned how to set a goal and then stick to it.
snippet: Colts Coach Jim Caldwell may have frustrated Peyton Manning by benching him in a loss to the Jets, but he showed he learned how to set a goal and then stick to it.
